Params: {2: 'Alonso', 3: 'I long to hear your story, which must take the ear strangely. I believe we all do.'}
{2: 'Duke Prospero', 3: 'Sir, I invite your highness and your train to my humble cave.'}
{2: 'Duke Prospero', 3: "At a convenient moment, which will be soon, I'll explain everything and all these strange occurrences will become clear."}
{2: 'Duke Prospero', 3: 'Until then be cheerful, and be assured that all is well.'}
{2: 'Gonzalo', 3: 'The Duke of Milan was thrust out of Milan, but he found his dukedom in a poor island. His descendants should become kings of Naples.'}
{2: 'Gonzalo', 3: 'We all found ourselves when no man was himself.'}
{2: 'Gonzalo', 3: 'This cannot be any better, for it must be gods that have marked out the path that bought us here.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'The Duke of Milan did not seek revenge for the hardship he encountered.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'Instead, he forgave every man who had wronged him, after they confessed.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'Years later, all the things that happened were slowly forgotten.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'The people of Naples continued to live on a beautiful land as always.'}
{2: 'Gentle Female Voice', 3: 'Naples was still a place of hope, despite the occasional disputes and conflicts.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena, is this the ending that you wanted to show me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But why? Why do I struggle to understand you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "What's the point in the same happily ever after ending? This is just too bland. A tragedy would be much more impactful.", 4: '1'}
